entry.title: Do Kwon Wants to Save Terra by Creating a New Chain With 1B of Tokens for LUNA and UST Holders The proposal also scraps stablecoin design - for now.
entry.summary: The Terra ecosystem’s notorious leader is trying to salvage the resources and talent left behind in the wreckage that is UST’s depegging.

entry.title: Algorithmic Stablecoin Landscape Suffers Tremors After Terra Crash
entry.summary: Terra’s UST collapse has shattered the foundations of the algorithmic stablecoin market.

entry.title: Trader May Have Lost $9M in Exit from USDT Data Indicates Bots Made Off With Huge Sum on Arbitrum
entry.summary: Data Indicates Bots Made Off With Huge Sum on Arbitrum

entry.title: Terra Network Restarts After Second Shutdown; Binance Delists LUNA and UST Pairs
entry.summary: Terra Stops and Starts to Salvage Network.

entry.title: Lido Increases Liquidity Incentives as stETH Trades at Discount to ETH
entry.summary: Lido Finance has announced $1.3M in new incentives to improve stETH:ETH liquidity.
